keyMoments.title: Straw Hats Decide to Rescue Hatchan
keyMoments.description: After initial hesitation due to Hatchan's past with the Arlong Pirates, the crew follows Nami's decision to honor their promise to Camie and rescue Hatchan.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's unity, their trust in Nami's judgment, and their willingness to give former enemies a second chance.

keyMoments.title: Flying Fish Riders Trap Activated
keyMoments.description: Duval activates his trap, surrounding the Straw Hat Pirates with the Flying Fish Riders for an impending battle.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the major confrontation between the crews and Duval's reveal.

description: A crew of riders who use flying fish as mounts, led by the masked Duval. They work as kidnappers and slave traders.

keyMoments.title: Macro Pirates Capture Camie and Pappag
keyMoments.description: The Macro Pirates capture Camie and Pappag when they jump overboard to save Hatchan, working as part of Duval's trap.
keyMoments.significance: Forces the Straw Hats' hand and leads to Nami's decision to rescue Hatchan.

keyMoments.title: Macro Pirates Defeated by Hatchan
keyMoments.description: After being freed, Hatchan easily defeats all three Macro Pirates with a single powerful punch.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Hatchan's strength and the Macro Pirates' relative weakness compared to the main characters.

description: A small crew of three fish-men who are former members of the Sun Pirates. They engage in kidnapping and slave trading, particularly targeting mermaids.
